Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells stably expressing DMT1 (either singly or in combination with wild-type or mutant A53T α-synuclein) were used.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased autophagy and neuronal cell death
Readout description.Result Description: Mutant A53T α-synuclein combined with DMT1 induced enhanced autophagy and cell death, while wild-type α-synuclein showed reduced effects.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal cell viability and autophagy levels (assumed standard for cell culture experiments).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant reduction in cell viability and increased autophagy markers (assumed standard for cell culture experiments).
